title: Made a vow to pray 6 rakahs, can I pray them during forbidden (prohibited) times? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: says if i vowed to pray six raka's if i were to ever commit a particular sin can i pray them at the times of prohibition meaning after asar and before sunset or after fajr and before sun rise the answer is yes because this is a vow and whenever you make a vow this is exempted from the times of prohibition
